item.deeds.fox_devil_contract.pability: Primary Ability : Kon ) the Fox Devil's jaw clashes at your enemy. - 4 SRC
item.deeds.fox_devil_contract.sability: Secondary Ability : Swallow ) If an enemy is stunned from the jaw, extra damage can be dealt. - 8 SRC
item.deeds.fox_devil_contract.trade: X : You will take one damage, and temporarily be unable to heal every use.
item.deeds.blood_devil_contract.pability: Primary Ability : Blood Manipulation ) You can create random blood weapons from your blood. - 4 SRC
item.deeds.blood_devil_contract.sability: Secondary Ability : Blood Empowerment ) You can drink blood and have a chance to heal, remove status effects, or get strength.
item.deeds.blood_devil_contract.trade: X : You will have less health, and have a low chance to get stunned everytime you use the Primary Ability.
